summary.span: 提供會呈現程序流程視覺化表現方式的設計介面。

span.span: Provides a design surface, which renders a visual representation of process flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 這種設計介面，可以呈現工作流程標記中描述的程序流程視覺化表示。 is the design surface which renders a visual representation of process flow described in workflow markup. 提供了豐富的使用者介面功能組，滿足活動設計工具的需求，協助呈現並且回應各種 Windows 產生的事件。 offers a rich set of user interface functionality needed by the activity designers for rendering and for responding to various Windows-generated events. 同時， 也提供了一些一般功能，可以讓所有設計工具用來執行某些活動。Also, the offers a set of common functions which can be used by all designers to perform certain activities. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 方法取得 類別的執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how you can obtain an instance of the class using the method. 此程式碼會設定數個 屬性，包括 和 ，並呼叫 方法。The code then sets several properties, including and , and calls the method. 這個程式碼範例是 WorkflowDesignerControl.cs 檔案中＜工作流程分析設計工具 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程追蹤設定檔設計工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Workflow Tracking Profile Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用兩種座標空間：邏輯和工作區。 uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - 工作區座標相對於 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角為 (0,0)。X 和 Y 座標在可檢視的區域中會沿著垂直和水平方向遞增。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作區座標系統會受到 的縮放層級和捲軸位置的影響。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. - 在邏輯座標系統中，每個物件都會永遠對應到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 垂直和水平位置都不受縮放或捲軸位置影響。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用兩種座標空間：邏輯和工作區。 uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: - 工作區座標相對於 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角為 (0,0)。X 和 Y 座標在可檢視的區域中會沿著垂直和水平方向遞增。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作區座標系統會受到 的縮放層級和捲軸位置的影響。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. 在邏輯座標系統中，每個物件都會永遠對應到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 垂直和水平位置都不受縮放或捲軸位置影響。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.

Protected Overrides Sub OnQueryContinueDrag (qcdevent As QueryContinueDragEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains information about the event.

summary.span: 發生於拖曳作業時，允許拖曳來源決定是否應取消拖曳作業。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag option should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當拖曳作業期間鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更時，將引發 事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag operation. 事件允許拖曳來源決定是否應取消拖曳作業。The event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled. 當控制項為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target) 時，將引發與拖曳作業有關的事件。Events related to drag operations are raised when the control is a valid drop target. 將以指定的拖曳效果引發 事件。The event is raised with the drag effect specified. 如需拖曳效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別 (Enumeration)。For a list of drag effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更，便會引發 事件，並根據事件 `Action`的 屬性值決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料或取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件會加以配對，如此在滑鼠移過置放目標時，便會在滑鼠的位置為使用者提供最新的回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則剪下資料。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 依預設， 事件會在按下 ESC 鍵時，將 `Action` 設為 `DragAction.Cancel`，並在按下滑鼠左、中或右鍵時，將 `Action` 設為 `DragAction.Drop`。By default, the event sets `Action` to `DragAction.Cancel` if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to `DragAction.Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用兩種座標空間：邏輯和工作區。 uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client: 工作區座標相對於 的左上角。Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the . 左上角為 (0,0)。X 和 Y 座標在可檢視的區域中會沿著垂直和水平方向遞增。The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area. 工作區座標系統會受到 的縮放層級和捲軸位置的影響。The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the and by the scrollbar position. 在邏輯座標系統中，每個物件都會永遠對應到 0,0。In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0. 垂直和水平位置都不受縮放或捲軸位置影響。The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程檢視影像會建立為點陣圖。The workflow view image is created as a bitmap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何為 事件指定處理常式。The following code example demonstrates how you can assign a handler to the event. 這個程式碼範例是 ViewHost.cs 檔案中＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the ViewHost.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
